ClassInfo.author: JEAF Development Team
ClassInfo.description: Demo class for generation of message constants.

Message.defaultText: Executing SWIFT booking from account ''{0}'' to ''{1}''.
Message.description: Trace message when executing SWIFT booking.
Message.name: SWIFT_BOOKING

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Executing SWIFT booking from account ''{0}'' to ''{1}'' (Language: de)
Executing SWIFT booking from account ''{0}'' to ''{1}'' (Language: de_CH)

Message.description: Error message in case that a money transfer is not possible due to insufficient bank balance.
Message.name: BANK_BALANCE_NOT_SUFFICIENT

Message.description: Localized text for user interface label showing transaction amount.
Message.name: TX_AMOUNT_LABEL
